attributes.action: new train service linking Okehampton to Taunton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Govt should instruct the Ministry of Transport to introduce a feasibility study for  a new train service linking Okehampton to Taunton and re-opening or  building new railway stations at Collumpton ,  Devon and Wellington , Somerset, as this will  encourage  people who have to commute either  to Exeter or Taunton to use this method of transport.
